thread.title: New Busch Stadium summer concert announcement coming Thursday
thread.title_full: New Busch Stadium summer concert announcement coming Thursday

author: Kevin C. Johnson St. Louis Post-Dispatch
title: New Busch Stadium summer concert announcement coming Thursday
text:
Who will perform at Busch Stadium this summer? New Busch Stadium summer concert announcement coming Thursday By Kevin C. Johnson St. Louis Post-Dispatch Feb 1, 2017 
Who will perform at Busch Stadium this summer? TownNews.com Content Exchange 
Busch Stadium is gearing up for another big concert this summer; last year, Busch Stadium was home to the sold-out Paul McCartney concert . 
St. Louis Cardinals and Live Nation will host a press conference Thursday afternoon at Ballpark Village in which they will announce the summer concert at Busch Stadium. 
Attendees at the press conference will include Ozzie Smith, Hall of Fame St. Louis Cardinals shortstop; Steve Stenger, county executive of St. Louis County, Francis Slay, mayor of St. Louis; Vicki Bryant, vice president of event services and merchandising for the St. Louis Cardinals; and Dave Gerardi, president of Live Nation St. Louis. 
Previous concerts at Busch Stadium were Dave Matthews Band in 2008, the Eagles in 2010 and U2 in 2011, which shows Busch Stadium's successful track record in being home to rock bands. 
Will that trend continue with Thursday's announcement?
